overview:
Scott Bales is the global leader on Innovation in Financial Services and Mobility. A thought leader on the intersection between cultural & behavioral changes with the technology innovations, passionate about mobile financial inclusion and how organizations can optimize their their technology investments.

With over ten years of international experience in innovation, thought leadership and implementation planning, Scott’s experience includes technology solutions and strategies in retail banking, risk management, cash management, transaction banking and mobile financial services.

He worked with various governments and took on key advisory roles for countrywide infrastructure and projects in mobile commerce, remittances and banking throughout the Asia Pacific and African regions for both developed and emerging markets. He strategically contributed to projects in countries such as Cambodia, Indonesia, the Philippines, Malaysia and Singapore, yielding strategic and measurable results in developing the mobile commerce space for these markets.

Scott is leading the charge to define Movenbank’s groundbreaking mobile-centric vision and implementing the technologies as its Chief Mobile Officer. Enabling Movenbank customers to spend, save and live smarter.

Scott runs the regional office for strategic advisory firm User Strategy with best selling Bank 2.0 author Brett King. Where he enables clients to capture the opportunities presented by new and emerging technologies and innovations, as well as realize the concrete benefits of a properly executed social network strategy.

A regular global speaker on visions for change and the future. Scott publishes his thought leadership on his personal blog money-mesh.com
